bill_title: condition the availability of certain tuition waiver or remission programs if no special funding is provided.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to condition the availability of certain tuition waiver or remission programs if no special funding is provided. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 13-55-23 be amended to read as follows: 13-55-23. Notwithstanding any other provisions of law to the contrary , legislatively mandated exemptions, whether whole or partial, from the obligation to pay tuition or other required fees apply only to classes, courses and instructional programs directly supported by moneys appropriated from the general fund the extent of moneys appropriated specifically for such purposes by the Legislature from the general fund. If appropriations have been made but are insufficient to meet the legislatively mandated exemptions, the Board of Regents shall identify those eligible persons who shall receive such waivers or reductions as may be available, giving priority to those persons who are closest to completing their degree requirements . 500 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
